poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Right lads, says Iskander, As he lands in Asia proper, Gol is river, La is pass, Roxane is mine. The rest You know, and in this slam We take the slaughter to the lambs. Who lags is lost, who inter- Lards the sinews of this force â€“ Go home to ma. The labs, some day, Will want you.
